actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, and Office of Management and Budget.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 102-109.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 161.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: A bill to authorize extensions of time limitations in certain FERC-issued Licenses.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to extend, upon request of certain licensees, the time required for them to acquire real property and commence and complete construction of specified hydroelectric power projects on the Arkansas River. Terminates such authority three years after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize extensions of time limitations in certain FERC-issued Licenses.
